Author: Kibit
Title: 🚀🌟VNX: decentralized marketplace for VC investors🌟🚀
Body: VNX Bridging the gap between venture capital and crypto industries   | TELEGRAM | TWITTER |     VNX is developing the world's first decentralized marketplace and trading platform, where investors can buy and sell tokenized investment portfolios of venture capital funds and accelerators      | Building the world’s first regulated security token marketplace | | Unlocking liquidity in the $ 1th global venture capital industry | | Providing access to venture capital to “Main Street” investors | | Leveraging Luxembourg as Europe’s leading financial hub | | Providing a new way for funds to raise capital |   Venture capital is major driver of innovation and generates attractive returns, yet not accessible to “Main Street” investors     By creating a regulated marketplace we are unlocking venture capital for millions of “ordinary” investors      Venture capitalists will be able to convert their existing investment portfolios into liquid digital assets     By listing a VC portfolio on VNX, liquidity will be unlocked and new sources of capital leveraged      We’ve developed a fully functional prototype that lays the groundwork for a robust and regulatory compliant platform    Our aim is to become the main platform for tokenised investment funds by 2022   | July 2018 - Application for license | | 2019 - Launch of the platform | | 2020 - Geographical expansion | | 2021 - Opening the platform to other investment classes |

Author: Kibit
Title: 🚀🌟VNX: decentralized marketplace for VC investors🌟🚀
Body: Recently the blockchain technology summit Consensus 2018 finished in New York. Our VNX team was pleased to note that security tokens was one of the most hottest and debated topics at the stage as well as in the corridors.   Now it becomes more obvious that thousands of security tokens are ready to come to the market, provided their liquidity is secured. And the next significant development expected by community will be the launch of exchanges capable of bringing liquidity and capital from existing financial market.   In addition to the explosion of interest to the cryptocurrency space from the tech and VC community, there is an increasing interest from a much wider audience of traditional private and institutional financial investors, who are not yet investing in crypto. Experts see a huge potential for growth in this segment, given that today this market still represents a tiny fraction of the overall financial markets. For example, according to some estimates, in the United States alone there are about 10 million accredited investors, of whom only about 200,000 are active investors. While the total capitalization of crypto-industry today is just a bit under $400bn, it is far from achieving any meaningful scale, when compared to the private capital market, which alone represents $5 trln in assets under management.

Author: VentureBlock
Title: 🚀🌟VNX: decentralized marketplace for VC investors🌟🚀
Body: The Luxembourg Bankers’ Association (ABBL) has added VNX Exchange to the ABBL Fintech Map. The ABBL focuses on innovation in FinTech, FundTech, RegTech, InsurTech firms, finance-related software vendors and IT solution providers. Read more details at: https://vnx.io/the-luxembourg-bankers-association-abbl-has-added-vnx-exchange-to-the-abbl-fintech-map/
